page.title: 09ENTERTAINMENT (2)
page.content: The Itchen Valley Flower Show takes place annually in July. There is one public house in our block called {'The Percy Hobbs'. }This pub was originally called the 'New Inn' but was recently renamed after its oldest regular customer who is 85 years of age. This pub has a little trade from Easton but draws most of business from the nearby Caravan Site.It has a flourishing summer trade with facilities for children. Licensing Hours are: Weedays: 10.30am -2.30pm 6.00pm-10.30pm Sundys: 12.00pm -2.00pm 7.00pm-10.30pm. Licensing Hours could change in the near future. A strong lobby of opinion wants flexible opening hours as in Europe.
